remarks: ` G ` is a continuous function.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
etransclem43.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
etransclem43.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) |`t S ) ) $.
etransclem43.p $e |- ( ph -> P e. NN ) $.
etransclem43.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. NN0 ) $.
etransclem43.f $e |- F = ( x e. X |-> ( ( x ^ ( P - 1 ) ) x. prod_ j e. ( 1 ... M ) ( ( x - j ) ^ P ) ) ) $.
etransclem43.g $e |- G = ( x e. X |-> sum_ i e. ( 0 ... R ) ( ( ( S Dn F ) ` i ) ` x ) ) $.
etransclem43 $p |- ( ph -> G e. ( X -cn-> CC ) ) $.
$d F x $.
$d M j x $.
$d P j x $.
$d R i j x $.
$d S j x $.
$d X i j x $.
$d i j ph x $.
